overview: Switzerland, in the May of 2019, An ad airs. Zurich Life Insurance. A strange man torments John's skiing trip with the advantages of such a service, and when John's father mysteriously "Fell Off The North face" and is killed, John faces a harsh, vibrant and nightmarish world, unbeknownst to him, wether it's Fact or Fiction.
tagline: 'You Don't Want to End up With A lot Less. That Can Stressful And Daunting'
title: Zurich
